ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var objectName = p('salesforce.objects.cardRequest') var limitValue = attributes.queryParams.limit default "100" var offsetValue = attributes.queryParams.offset default "0" --- "SELECT Id, Request_Number__c, Customer__c, Card_Type__c, Status__c, Request_Date__c FROM $(objectName) ORDER BY Request_Date__c DESC LIMIT $(limitValue) OFFSET $(offsetValue)"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map (item, index) -> { Id: item.Id, Request_Number__c: item.Request_Number__c, Customer__c: item.Customer__c, Card_Type__c: item.Card_Type__c, Status__c: item.Status__c, Request_Date__c: item.Request_Date__c }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- [{ Request_Number__c: payload.Request_Number__c, Customer__c: payload.Customer__c, Card_Type__c: payload.Card_Type__c, Status__c: payload.Status__c, Request_Date__c: payload.Request_Date__c }]

salesforce:query.doc:name: Query Created Record
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: #["SELECT Id, Request_Number__c, Customer__c, Card_Type__c, Status__c, Request_Date__c FROM $(p('salesforce.objects.cardRequest')) WHERE Id = '$(vars.createdId)'"]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { Id: payload[0].Id, Request_Number__c: payload[0].Request_Number__c, Customer__c: payload[0].Customer__c, Card_Type__c: payload[0].Card_Type__c, Status__c: payload[0].Status__c, Request_Date__c: payload[0].Request_Date__c }

logger.doc:name: Log Failure
logger.message: Failed to create card request in Salesforce

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { error: "CREATION_FAILED", message: payload[0].errors[0].message default "Failed to create record", timestamp: now(), correlationId: vars.correlationId }
